summary: The implementation successfully addresses both requirements. REQ-27 is fully implemented with the logo displayed in the Hero component with proper styling and brand colors. REQ-28 is partially implemented: the Hero component correctly references the logo asset path, but there is no evidence in the diff that the logo file was actually placed in the frontend/public/assets/generated directory as specified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Store the uploaded Brilliant Coaching Centre logo as a static asset in the frontend/public/assets/generated directory
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files. While the Hero component references '/assets/Brilliant Coaching Centre copy.jpg', there is no evidence that the logo file was actually saved to frontend/public/assets/generated directory. The path referenced doesn't match the specified directory structure (missing 'generated' subdirectory).

hallucinated_features.description: Logo displayed with rounded-full styling and hover scale animation effects
hallucinated_features.reason: The logo is styled with 'rounded-full' class and hover:scale-105 transition animation. The BuildRequest explicitly lists 'Adding animation effects to the logo' as a non-goal.
